entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 12:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
